description: This promptware is used to convert the text to a programmatic command.
creator: OpenAI

text_to_command.name: text_to_command
text_to_command.description: This promptware is used to convert the text to a programmatic command.
text_to_command.instruction: Convert this text to a programmatic command:
demonstration:
Ask Constance if we need some bread
send-msg `find constance` Do we need some bread?

input.text: Reach out to the ski store and figure out if I can get my skis fixed before I leave on Thursday

example.output: send-msg `find ski store` Can you tell me if you have any skis in stock that I can use before I leave on Thursday?

example_prompt:
Convert this text to a programmatic command:
Ask Constance if we need some bread
send-msg `find constance` Do we need some bread?


Reach out to the ski store and figure out if I can get my skis fixed before I leave on Thursday
